channel.title: Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich
channel.description: Recent content on Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich

item.title: Grill Welcome Event!
item.description: Sign Up Become a CSSZ Member NEW DATE: 20. 5. 2022 17:00 English version follows Prosím, přihlaste se na tuto událost zde, abychom mohli dobře odhadnout celkovou účast (ulehčí nám to nákup)! Pokud ještě nejste členy CSSZ, zaregistrujte se nejprve jako člen CSSZ zde a akce je pro Vás zdarma. Děkujeme :) Na konci dubna tohoto roku oficiálně vznikl spolek Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich. K této příležitosti organizujeme grilování na Käferbergu!

item.title: Events
item.description: Welcome to our Events! Here, you will find out all you need to know about the events we have organized for you! Grill Welcome Event! Sign Up Date 20. 5. 2022 at 17:00 Where Käferberg Grillstelle Details Event Sign up Sign up Price free for CSSZ members / 8CHF (you can become member here) .sign-in{ padding:5px 15px;background-color:rgb(30,30,30);color:white;border-radius:5px;float:right; } .sign-in:hover{ background-color:rgb(50,50,50); } .sign-in:active{ background-color:rgb(70,70,70); }

item.title: About us
item.description: The CSSZ (Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich) is an association founded by 4 ETH students from Czech Republic and Slovakia. Goals of The Association To unite the community of students from the Czech Republic and Slovakia in Zurich. This goal is achieved by organizing various social events. By organizing these for everyone (participation is not limited by nationality, religion or gender), we also want to present Czech and Slovak culture.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: You can either contact us on general info@cssz.ch or contact a specific board member. Address: Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich c/o VSETH CAB E27 Universitätstrasse 6 8092 Zürich Switzerland

item.title: Hello and Welcome to CSSZ!🇨🇿🇸🇰
item.description: Hello and Welcome! Welcome to the official webpage of Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich! Stay tuned as we will post soon about what we have planned for you!
